code: @Manual{,   title = {rjd3workspace: Interface to 'JDemetra+ 3.x' time series analysis software},   author = {Jean Palate and Alain Quartier-la-Tente and Tanguy Barthelemy and Anna Smyk},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 3.2.4.9000, https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3workspace/},   url = {https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3workspace}, }

what: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
text: {rjd3workspace} offers several functions wrangle JDemetra+ v3.x workspaces. Seasonal adjustment X-12ARIMA can done package {rjd3x13} TRAMO-SEATS package {rjd3tramoseats}.

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
text: {rjd3workspace} relies {rJava} package Running rjd3 packages requires Java 17 higher. set configuration R explained

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
text: get current stable version (latest release): GitHub: r-universe:

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
text: can install development version {rjd3workspace} GitHub :

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
code: library("rjd3workspace")  dir <- tempdir()  y <- rjd3toolkit::ABS$X0.2.09.10.M jws <- .jws_new() jsap1 <- .jws_sap_new(jws, "sa1") add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13", x = rjd3x13::x13(y)) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo", x = rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats(y)) save_workspace(jws, file.path(dir, "ws.xml"))  jws <- .jws_load(file = file.path(dir, "ws.xml")) .jws_compute(jws) # to compute the models jsap1 <- .jws_sap(jws, idx = 1) # first SAProcessing jsa1 <- .jsap_sa(jsap1, idx = 1) # first SAItem .jsa_name(jsa1) #> [1] "x13" mod1 <- .jsa_read(jsa1)

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
code: # install.packages("remotes") # remotes::install_github("rjdverse/rjd3providers")  dir <- tempdir()  xlsx_file <- paste0(system.file("examples", package = "rjd3providers"), "/Insee.xlsx") ts1 <- rjd3providers::spreadsheet_series(file = xlsx_file, sheet = 1L, series = 3L)  y <- ts1$data jws <- .jws_new() jsap1 <- .jws_sap_new(jws, "sa1") add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13", x = rjd3x13::x13(y)) set_ts(jsap = jsap1, idx = 1L, y = ts1) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo", x = rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats(y)) set_ts(jsap = jsap1, idx = 2L, y = ts1)  save_workspace(jws, file.path(dir, "ws.xml"))  jws <- .jws_load(file = file.path(dir, "ws.xml")) .jws_compute(jws) # to compute the models jsap1 <- .jws_sap(jws, idx = 1) # first SAProcessing jsa1 <- .jsap_sa(jsap1, idx = 1) # first SAItem .jsa_name(jsa1) #> [1] "x13" mod1 <- .jsa_read(jsa1)

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
code: xlsx_path <- normalizePath("data/IPI_nace4.xlsx", mustWork = TRUE) csv_path <- normalizePath("data/IPI_nace4.csv", mustWork = TRUE) ws_path <- normalizePath("WS/ws_industrie.xml", mustWork = TRUE)  jws <- .jws_open(file = ws_path)  # Update all the second SA-Processing with a new path spreadsheet_update_path(     jws = jws,     new_path = xlsx_path,     idx_sap = 2L )  txt_update_path(     jws = jws,     new_path = csv_path,     idx_sap = 1L )  save_workspace(jws = jws, file = ws_path, replace = TRUE)

title: Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x time series analysis software
text: contribution welcome done pull requests /issues. pull requests include updated tests updated documentation. functionality changed, docstrings added updated.

text: Add SA-item SAProcessing

title: Add a SA-item to a SAProcessing — add_sa_item
Add a SA-item to a SAProcessing — add_sa_item
text: jsap SAProcessing. name name SA-item added. x either seasonal adjustment model (rjd3x13::x13() rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats()), SA-item "ts" object. spec specification use x "ts" object. ... unused parameters.

title: Add a SA-item to a SAProcessing — add_sa_item
code: dir <- tempdir() y <- rjd3toolkit::ABS$X0.2.09.10.M jws <- .jws_new() jsap1 <- .jws_sap_new(jws, "sa1") add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13", x = rjd3x13::x13(y)) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo", x = rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats(y)) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13-2", x = y, rjd3x13::x13_spec()) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo-2", x = y, rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats_spec()) save_workspace(jws, file.path(dir, "workspace.xml"))

title: Check existing JD+ object — check_information

title: Check existing JD+ object — check_information
text: object idx_sai NULL function check workspace contains SA-Processing index idx_sap. object idx_sap NULL function check every SA-Processing workspace contains SA-Item index idx_sai. object idx_sap NULL idx_sai NULL function check. object idx_sap / idx_sai length > 1 checks iterated indices.

title: Check existing JD+ object — check_information
code: # ws <- .jws_open(file = "ws_production.xml") # # # Check if the SA-Item 3 in the SA-Processing 1 exists # check_information(jws = ws, idx_sap = 1, idx_sai = 3)  # # Check if the SA-Items 1, 2 and 5 in the SA-Processing 1 exist # check_information(jws = ws, idx_sap = 1, idx_sai = c(1, 2, 5))

title: Get the name of a SAProcessing or a Sa-item — .jsap_name
code: # \donttest{  y <- rjd3toolkit::ABS$X0.2.09.10.M  jws <- .jws_new() jsap1 <- .jws_sap_new(jws, "sa1")  add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13", x = rjd3x13::x13(y)) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo", x = rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats(y)) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13-2", x = y, rjd3x13::x13_spec()) add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "tramo-2", x = y, rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats_spec())  print(.jsap_sa_name(jsap1)) #> [1] "x13"     "tramo"   "x13-2"   "tramo-2" # }

title: Read an SA-item — read_sai
text: .jsai_results() extracts specific variables model SA-item read_sai() extracts information SA-item (see details). .jsai_jresults() extracts Java object results SA-item.

title: Read an SA-item — read_sai
Read an SA-item — read_sai
text: jsa Java SA-item object. items vector characters containing variables extract. See rjd3x13::x13_dictionary() rjd3tramoseats::tramoseats_dictionary(). default, extracts possible variables.

title: Read an SA-item — read_sai
text: SA-item contains information just results model. informations extracted read_sai() function returns list 5 objects: ts: raw time series. domainSpec: initial specification. Reference relaxing elements specification. estimationSpec: specification used current estimation. pointSpec: specification corresponding results current estimation (fully identified model). results: result model.

what: rjd3workspace: Interface to 'JDemetra+ 3.x' time series analysis software — rjd3workspace-package
title: rjd3workspace: Interface to 'JDemetra+ 3.x' time series analysis software — rjd3workspace-package
text: R Interface 'JDemetra+ 3.x' (https://github.com/jdemetra). offers several functions manipulate 'JDemetra+' workspaces, can read software can store several seasonal adjusted series along user-defined calendars regression variables.

title: rjd3workspace: Interface to 'JDemetra+ 3.x' time series analysis software — rjd3workspace-package
text: Maintainer: Tanguy Barthelemy tanguy.barthelemy@insee.fr [artist] Authors: Jean Palate palatejean@gmail.com Alain Quartier-la-Tente alain.quartier@yahoo.fr (ORCID) Anna Smyk anna.smyk@insee.fr

title: Save Workspace — save_workspace
text: Save Workspace

title: Save Workspace — save_workspace
Save Workspace — save_workspace
text: jws Workspace object export. file path export 'JDemetra+' Workspace (.xml file). replace boolean indicating Workspace replaced already exists.

title: Save Workspace — save_workspace
code: dir <- tempdir() jws <- .jws_new() jsap1 <- .jws_sap_new(jws, "sa1") y <- rjd3toolkit::ABS$X0.2.09.10.M add_sa_item(jsap1, name = "x13", x = y, rjd3x13::x13_spec()) save_workspace(jws, file.path(dir, "workspace.xml"))

what: Set Time Series Metadata of a SaItem — set_ts_metadata
title: Set Time Series Metadata of a SaItem — set_ts_metadata
text: Function set time series metadata SaItem (provider, source data...). set_ts_metadata() uses metadata another SaItem put_ts_metadata() allows update specific key new information.

title: Set Time Series Metadata of a SaItem — set_ts_metadata
code: set_ts_metadata(jsap, idx, ref_jsa)  put_ts_metadata(jsap, idx, key, value)

title: Set Time Series Metadata of a SaItem — set_ts_metadata
text: jsap SAProcessing modify. idx index target SA-item. ref_jsa reference SaItem containing metadata. key key metadata. value value metadata.

title: Set Time Series Metadata of a SaItem — set_ts_metadata
code: # Change the file of a given item file <- system.file("workspaces", "test.xml", package = "rjd3workspace") jws <- .jws_load(file) jsap <- .jws_sap(jws, 1) jsai <- .jsap_sai(jsap, 1) nid <- rjd3providers::spreadsheet_change_file(.jsai_ts_metadata(jsai, "@id"), "test.xlsx") put_ts_metadata(jsap, 1, "@id", nid)  jsai <- .jsap_sai(jsap, 1) .jsai_ts_metadata(jsai, "@id") #> [1] "demetra://tsprovider/XCLPRVDR/20111201/SERIES?file=test.xlsx#seriesName=European+Union&sheetName=Exports"
